info.ja: この選択は、ご利用の商品レビューアプリの設定よりも優先されます。

info.nb: Dette valget overstyrer innstillingene for appen for produktomtaler.

info.pl: Wybór ten jest nadrzędny w stosunku do ustawień aplikacji do recenzji produktów.
info.pt-BR: Esta seleção substitui as configurações do app de avaliação de produtos.
info.pt-PT: Esta seleção substitui as definições da aplicação de análise de produtos.
info.sv: Det här valet överskrider appinställningarna för din produktgranskning.

label.vi: Hiển thị tiền xu làm chỉ số trên

info.cs: Toto nastavení neplatí v případě, že používáte [výběr měny](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) nebo formát, který zahrnuje tečku před číslicí. Například: RS.1,000.00. [Získejte další informace.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.da: Denne indstilling vil ikke være gældende, hvis du bruger en [valutavælger](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) eller et format, der indeholder et punktum før tallet. For eksempel: DKK.1.000,00. [Flere oplysninger.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.de: Diese Einstellung wird nicht angewendet, wenn du eine [Währungsauswahl](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) benutzt oder ein Format verwendest, bei dem ein Punkt vor die Zahl gesetzt wird. Zum Beispiel: RS.1.000,00. [Mehr Infos.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.en: This setting won't apply if you're using a [currency selector](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) or format that includes a period before the number. For example: RS.1,000.00. [More info.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.es: Esta configuración no se aplicará si estás usando un [selector de moneda](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) o un formato que incluya un punto antes de la cifra. Por ejemplo: RS.1,000.00. [Más información](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.fi: Asetus ei ole voimassa, mikäli käytät [valuutanvalitsinta](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) tai muotoa, jossa on piste ennen numeroa. Esimerkiksi: RS. 1000,00. [Lisätietoa.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.fr: Ce paramètre ne s'appliquera pas si vous utilisez un [sélecteur de devise](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) ou un format qui inclut un point avant le chiffre. Par exemple : RS.1 000,00. [Plus d'informations.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.hi: यदि आप [currency selector](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) का उपयोग कर रहे हैं तो यह सेटिंग लागू नहीं होगी या प्रारूप जिसमें संख्या से पहले की अवधि शामिल है. उदाहरण के लिए: RS.1,000.00. [अधिक जानकारीके लिए.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.it: Questa impostazione non sarà applicata se utilizzi un [selettore di valuta](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) o un formato che include un punto fermo prima del numero. Ad esempio: RS. 1,000.00. [Ulteriori informazioni.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.ja: [通貨セレクター](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) または数字の前のピリオドを含む形式を使用している場合、この設定は適用されません。例: RS.1,000.00.[詳細情報](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.ko: 숫자 앞에 점이 포함되는 [통화 선택기](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) 또는 형식을 사용 중인 경우에는 이 설정이 적용되지 않습니다. 예: RS.1,000.00. [자세한 정보.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.nb: Denne innstillingen vil ikke gjelde hvis du bruker en [valutavelger](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) eller et format som inneholder et punktum før tallet. For eksempel: RS. 1.000,00. [Mer informasjon.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.nl: Deze instelling is niet van toepassing als je gebruik maakt van een [valutakiezer](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) of een formaat dat een punt vóór het getal bevat. Bijvoorbeeld: RS.1.000,00. [Voor meer informatie.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.pl: To ustawienie nie będzie miało zastosowania w przypadku korzystania z [selektora walut](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) lub formatu, który zawiera kropkę przed numerem. Np.: RS.1,000.00. [Więcej informacji.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.pt-BR: Essa configuração não se aplica se você está usando um [seletor de moeda](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) ou formato que inclui um ponto antes do número. Por exemplo: RS.1.000,00. [Mais informações.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.pt-PT: Esta definição não se aplica se estiver a utilizar um [seletor de moeda](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) ou formato que inclua um ponto antes do número. Por exemplo: .1,000.00 RS. [Mais informações.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.sv: Inställningen är inte tillämpbar om du använder en [valutaväljare](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) eller ett format som innehåller en punkt före siffran. Till exempel: RS.1000,00. [Ytterligare information.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.th: ระบบจะไม่ใช้การตั้งค่านี้หากคุณใช้ [เครื่องมือเลือกสกุลเงิน](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) หรือรูปแบบที่มีจุดหน้าตัวเลข เช่น: RS.1,000.00 [ดูข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.tr: Bir [para birimi seçici](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) veya sayıdan önce nokta içeren bir format kullanıyorsanız bu ayar geçerli değildir. Örneğin: RS.1,000.00. [Daha fazla bilgi.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.vi: Cài đặt này không áp dụng nếu bạn sử dụng [hộp chọn đơn vị tiền tệ](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) hoặc định dạng chứa dấu chấm trước số. Ví dụ: RS.1.000,00. [Thông tin thêm.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.zh-CN: 如果您使用的是 [货币选择器](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) 或数字前包含句点这种格式的设置，此设置便不适用。例如：1,000.00 卢比。[更多信息](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.zh-TW: 如果您使用 [幣別選擇器](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies)或數字前方帶有英文句點的格式，則無法套用此設定。例如：RS.1,000.00。[更多資訊](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
